content.raw:
just noticed comms broker subscribes to `/pose/info` topic which receives poses of all the static and non-static models, visuals, and collisions on every iteration, which is a bit of an overkill when it only needs the name of models.  

For breadcrumbs, maybe we can subscribe to `/scene/info` which gets a msg only if a new model is spawned?
